website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy portable bar table with LED lights to liven the party.
pros: LED lights work well and add an entertaining touch
Lightweight, sturdy, and easy to assemble
Hidden storage shelf maintains the tables fun but professional look and feel
cons: Tabletop may be prone to scratches
LED lights may not be appealing in certain settings

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Centerpiece For NASCAR Bar!
customer_reviews.text: We are setting up a group bar for our NASCAR camping group at ISM Raceway in Phoenix in November, and I have been searching for a bar that would not be high-priced and easy to transport and assemble. The Party Bar is PERFECT! What is truly amazing is that I ordered it the evening of the 8th and I received it today--the 10th! Thank you for the super prompt service. I love the LED lights on the edges and the shelf underneath. The carrying case makes it the perfect accessory for racing, camping or tailgating and I will be telling everyone who stops by our bar tent that I got this from PARTYPONGTABLES.COM!
customer_reviews.author: CIndy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Just the right size for the patio or a corner in the house during a party. The lights are very cool, and having a choice of the Hawaiian or black skirt is great. The ability to fold it up and put it in the case for on-the-go is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bar. Easy set up, light weight, lights work. Only issue is the advertising stating the lights have 20 different modes. No switch for any modes. Just an on and off switch with one mode. Colors change and blink on and off For the money it's still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and lightweight. Instructions were easy and it is very sturdy. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amber Krise

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! And Listennnnnnnn I’m buying another one! I’m a mixologist and I tend to bartend at a lot of events. I would rather bring my own table than to hope that the customer has a table that would best fit me!
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I really like the LED lights and the sturdiness of the bar. I use it for private parties. I’m a traveling bartender. Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: The best Portable Thing Sinced Sliced Bread!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these to use for a tradeshow counter. Other counters cost a fortune and had practically no table space! This one has lights, shelving, a case... it's great! The only thing we had to do was add some velcro dots to the front of the black fabric so we could attach a logo decal. We love it so much, we may buy another one and do the L-shaped setup!
customer_reviews.author: es beverage

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to break down but other than that very easy and nice look at parties
customer_reviews.author: catarina

customer_reviews.title: Great little pop up bar to serve our guests!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this little light up bar to use at our son's graduation party because we wanted to be intentional about keeping the alcohol separate. The lights were perfect and it looked so cute on our patio. I also love the handwritten note from the seller, great invention. Now it's all stored away until we need it again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: natalie lane

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Received my bar sooner than expected (next day) and used for a party I hosted on Saturday night. Everyone loved the LED lights. Bar held up pretty well. Lightweight, but after I stocked the shelf it was quite stable. Will be buying a second one soon.
customer_reviews.author: preston Block

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Speedy arrival. A little flimsy but great for camping and small parties
customer_reviews.author: Cris hipsher

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this table for my 21st birthday party. They included a nice note, and even left a note saying happy Birthday. The table has lasted 3 weeks so far in a college atmosphere. If any bar table can last 3 weeks in a room full of Buffalo Bills fans, it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I was missing the light they was so prompt and kind to send the missing lights. I would definitely recommend & re-order again.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya Neal

customer_reviews.title: This was a hit...
customer_reviews.text: it did wobble a bit...not for heavy products on shelf, but LED lights are a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST GIFT EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for me for as a gift and it is so friggin sweet! Super easy to set up and breakdown, which is great since we live in an apartment. Love the lights around the edge! My only complaint is that I didn't get this sooner before college football/tailgating season was over!
customer_reviews.author: brett wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great for any occasion. We love the product sturdy and easy to put together took two minutes. Would buy again. Shipping was also faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Maegen mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It was worth the money and the lights kept my party going ans created a festive atmosphere. Only con is I wish the legs were more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ramnath

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a party we are having in May and I already have it set up. My friends want to borrow it for their future parties.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: The lights on one side did not work but other than that it is very easy to set up and not heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Great for tailgates
customer_reviews.text: Battery holder needs to be taped to the bottom to hold it in place but otherwise works great
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for what we need it for and requires no assembly. Definitely buying another one
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Better the you can imagine ..
customer_reviews.text: Look great... Led light really stand up The shelf is be heavy duty .. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack is broken, it came damaged, so my lights are not working because the batteries cant stay in
customer_reviews.author: melvin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the bar. Instant hit for my bartending needs!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely wonderful table. Everyone at my party enjoy the lightning and effects.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. I would recommend partypong tables to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: john coulter

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at my party!! For a portable bar this was awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bar setup!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Perfect for when you need a portable bar setup!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: GREAT idea for any party!
customer_reviews.text: This product came quickly & was perfect for my husband's 50th birthday! Love the 2 different "skirts" do you can make it more formal or just fun. The lights are a great touch too. My husband has always wanted a bar, but we didn't really have room for one, so this portable bar was perfect! It is a very clever design & the shelf is a great addition. I love that it folds up right into it's bag & takes up very little storage space. There was even a hand written note from the owner - nice touch! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: batmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for mini bar! Although we didn't put glass bottles/items on shelf, shelf worked out for other items. Easy set-up & the lights were a very nice option! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Casa De Oro

customer_reviews.title: Cute just not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am.a Mobile Bartender and I have clients that don't have lots of space in their homes. This works perfect for small spaces. Not very sturdy ..but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cool little mini bar table. Appears to be well built and the lights are a neat feature. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Been looking for an easy party bar without spending a lot of $$$ for my upcomimg party and needed a nice size Bar in the backyard since i dont have enough room and This Party Bar is PERFECT!!! Love the LED lights around it and how easy it is to put together...my own portable party bar..yeaaahhh!!!!!.. Im a Happy Customer and will be buying again for other stuff that i may need. Thank you Adam(Owner) and your team for this awesome product! Happy Holidays!!🍻👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Junior Taumoepeau

product_meta.title: PartyPongTables.com Portable Folding Party Bar w/ LED Lights (Black & Hawaiian Bar Skirts) - Single Set
product_meta.description: The Party Bar Portable Bar is a must-have at any party, tailgate, or event where drinks are to be enjoyed. The Party Bar is super portable, lightweight, rigid, and completely functional. The bar sets up quickly with ease. The bar shelf easily rests on top of each leg brace creating additional storage space for cups, ice, garnishes, etc. It's best to put heavier items on the ground, under the shelf. Choose and easily attach the front/side skirt that fits your party atmosphere. Attach the black skirt for a formal/neutral event or bring the tropics to your party at any location with the Hawaiian bar skirt. The Portable Party Bar comes with a nylon carrying case with shoulder straps for convenient portability and also keeps your Party Bar protected while in storage. The Color-Changing LED Glow Lights add an awesome lighting effect to your Portable Party Bar. Easily visible in daylight and extra vibrant in the dark, these battery-powered LED glow light put the 'Party' in Party Bar.
feature_bullets: Portable party Bar W/ LED lights: LED glow Lights feature 16 different colors, 4 Light modes (Flashing, Solid, Fade, etc.) w/ Adjustable Speed & Brightness. Requires (3) AA batteries per side - Batteries not included.
Features: lightweight, portable, rigid bar that sets up in seconds. Perfect for parties, tailgating, BBQs, catering, and events.

Decorative party Bar skirts: 2 skirts included with every party Bar (Black & Hawaiian). each skirt easily wraps around the front and the side and is attached with pre-installed hook Velcro for secure adhesion
Design: Functional design facilitates quick setup and breakdown. Storage shelf easily locks into leg braces for extra storage. Everything fits compactly into nylon carrying/storage bag.

Materials: aluminum framing & square fold out legs give the party bar rigidity, yet keeping it lightweight. The bar surface is 4 mm Thick MDF with Melamine laminate, keeping it clean, scratch-proof, and water-proof.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars71 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
